summary: I have taken the popular mod Rayeks End and added my own flair, and added items from the General Stores mod.
descriptionHtml:
[LINE]
[SIZE=5][FONT=Arial][CENTER]Rayeks End with General Stores
[/CENTER][/FONT][/SIZE][LINE]
This is my modded version of the popular mod [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16028/?]Rayeks End[/URL] where I have tweaked it to my liking and added in the [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?]General Stores[/URL] Mod.
Rayeks End is a hidden player home located between Riverwood and Whiterun. General Stores is a cloud inventory sorter mod. I love General Stores, and Rayeks End and thought that these two great mods should be merged. Hense Rayeks End with General Stores was created. I did get permission from Rayek to upload my version of his mod. Thank you Rayek! Also Thank you Harvy2112 for creating General Stores. I cant immagine playing my game with out either of these two great mods!
[LINE]
[COLOR=#C00000][SIZE=5][FONT=Arial][B]Important info please read![/B][/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]This mod requires General Stores in order to work properly. There are 2 versions. The first version 1A includes General Stores, and all content required. If you use General Stores already DO NOT get that version. If you want Rayeks End to have GS only, as in you do not want GS for any other house and dont plan to use it in the future then get 1A. However if you do have GS and use it for your other houses then please get the newer version 1B. Or if you dont have other GS houses yet and want them in the future get 1B because you have to install GS for 1B to work properly.[/SIZE]
[LINE]
[SIZE=5][FONT=Arial][B]Future Plans:[/b][/FONT][/SIZE]
[LIST]
[*]The armor wardrobe will become a GS Armor sorter, (atm it just stores armor with out a sorting option)
[*]An unburden fountain will be placed somewhere near the front or maybe near the rogues treasure shrine.
[*]The Rogues treasure shrine sorters will be fixed to only display one activatable
[*]A Stack of books GS will be added either by the library or on the bar counter
[*]Lastly I hope to implement a buff system. I want the player to be able to get a 60 second buff to Alchemy, Blacksmithing, Cooking, and/or Enchanting by clicking the nearby book. I also hope to add a 12hr VERY SMALL Charisma buff for taking a dip in the bath. likely triggered by sitting in the chair. Later if I can find a way to have it auto remove all armor before bathing I hope to add that.
[/LIST]
[LINE]

[B][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial]Video Preview:[/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
This video was made just before asking Rayek if I could upload it. It was more to show what I had done with my own personal game save. I will have an updated video out asap.

[CENTER][youtube]H9IGc9OVWGI[/youtube][/CENTER]
[LINE]
[B]Also if you like General Stores I have included a list of other GS Houses for you, if you wish to use this mod to its fullest potential:[/B]

[LIST]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15272]Skyrim Adventurers Tent[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19297]Niires Honeyside[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19690]Niires Proudspire[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19974]Niires Hjerim[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20023]Dovahkiins Basement[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10340]Castle Dovah[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22147]Geir Manor[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25282]General Stores Breezehome[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25283]GS Honeyside[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25236]GS Proudspire[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25316]GS Vlindrel Hall[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25364]GS Fort Dawnguard[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25343]Hearthfire GS and Cistern for Houses[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25306]Auogrimr[/URL]
[*][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25947]A More Organized Luxury Suite feat GS[/URL][/LIST]

Also General Stores has optional file versions of Asteria Airship and Harveys Honeyside. As well as an optional file for Anise's Cabin.
author: Dartania Begoth
